info.author: Joshua Li
info.description:
sakura
==========================
|PyPI Version| |Travis Status| |License MIT|

Sakura is a collection of utilities for webpage scraping and content extraction.

Part of the Hanami_ suite!

- sakura_
- himawari_


🌸 Usage (to be edited soon)
---------------------

.. code-block:: pycon

    >>> import sakura
    >>> p = sakura.Page('https://github.com')
    >>> p.links()
    ['https://github.com/join?source=header-home', 'https://github.com/search', 'https://status.github.com/', ... ]
    >>> p.images()
    ['https://assets-cdn.github.com/images/modules/site/home-ill-build.png?sn', ... ]
    >>> p.emails()
    []

🌸 Installation
---------------------

Sakura is easily installed via pip!
::

    $ pip install sakura

🌸 Compatibility
---------------------

Sakura is Python 2.7 and 3.x compatible!



.. _Hanami: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hanami
.. _sakura: https://github.com/JoshuaRLi/sakura
.. _himawari: https://github.com/JoshuaRLi/himawari

.. |PyPI Version| image:: https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/sakura.svg
   :target: https://pypi.python.org/pypi/sakura

.. |Travis Status| image:: https://travis-ci.org/JoshuaRLi/sakura.svg?branch=master
    :target: https://travis-ci.org/JoshuaRLi/sakura

.. |License MIT| image:: https://img.shields.io/github/license/mashape/apistatus.svg
    :target: https://github.com/JoshuaRLi/sakura/blob/master/LICENSE
